alert.note: Alert for Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 9:39PM CDT until May 20 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri...Iowa... Mississippi River at Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Rock Island LD15. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water affects sidewalks along the river at Le Claire Park. Water also affects Credit Island Lane and Moline`s River Drive in the 4700 block. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday morning and continue falling to 13.4 feet next Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
